content: starlet headband www craftkitten com original pattern by jennifer reeve mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss 1 hank colinette tao 128yds per hank sport weight size f hook i used the left over yarn from making my hollywood starlet purse finished dimensions 16 ½ long not including chain ties 1 ¾ wide gauge 8sts & 3 row per inch in cable ccccaaaabbbblllleeee bbbbaaaannnndddd chain 15 bbbbaaaasssseeee rrrroooowwww half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook work 1 half_double_crochet in each chain to end turn 14 sts rrrroooowwww 1111 rs ch2 half_double_crochet in next st fpdc around each of next 10 sts half_double_crochet in each of last 2 sts turn ****ccccrrrroooossssssss rrrroooowwww rs ch2 half_double_crochet in next st skip next 5 sts fpdc around each of next 5 sts crossing in front of sts just completed fpdc around previ- ous 5 sts starting from right to left half_double_crochet in each of last 2 sts turn rrrroooowwww 3333 ws ch2 half_double_crochet in next st bpdc around each of next 10 sts half_double_crochet in each of last 2 sts turn rrrroooowwww 4444 rs ch2 half_double_crochet in next st fpdc around each of next 10 sts half_double_crochet in each of last 2 sts turn rrrroooowwww 5555 ws ch2 half_double_crochet in next st bpdc around each of next 10 sts half_double_crochet in each of last 2 sts turn ssssppppeeeecccciiiiaaaallll aaaabbbbbbbbrrrreeeevvvviiiiaaaattttiiiioooonnnnssss ffffppppddddcccc==== front post double_crochet repeat ccccrrrroooossssssss rrrroooowwww rrrroooowwww 5555 10 times and ccccrrrroooossssssss rrrroooowwww rrrroooowwww 3333 wrap the yarn round the hook once more insert the hook from in front and from right to left round stem of the ttttiiiieeeessss appropriate stitch and complete rrrroooowwww 44443333 ch2 half_double_crochet in each st turn 14 sts stitch normally rrrroooowwww 44444444 ch1 half_double_crochet in next st hdc2tog 6 times turn 7 sts bbbbppppddddcccc==== back post double_crochet wrap the yarn round the hook rrrroooowwww 44445555 ch1 half_double_crochet in next st hdc2tog 3 times turn 4 sts insert the hook from behind and rrrroooowwww 44446666 ch1 half_double_crochet in next st hdc2tog turn 2 sts from right to left round stem of the rrrroooowwww 44447777 ch1 half_double_crochet in next st 1 sts appropriate stitch and complete stitch normally chain 32 fasten_off hhhhddddcccc2222ttttoooogggg==== *yarn over insert hook in next st yo draw loop through* join with slip_stitch to opposite side of cable band and work yo draw through 2 loops repeat from from row 43 to end * to * once yo draw through all loops © craft kitten 2008 all rights reserved do not copy or distribute without permission sale of finished items is prohibited www
